text: @WhiteHouse @ICEgov Fake News. Provide Evidence. What about The CoronaVirus? What about The Economy? What about Social Injustice? What about empathy for 136,000+ families? What about our soldiers getting killed for money? MS13 is not the problem right now. Your diversion tactics are not working!
